Summary: seen shapes in sky then 1 landed
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at a kite flying event at broadway at the beach, I looked past the kites and noticed several objects flying in formation.One peeled of and flew near the event I was attending.it moved like a harrier jump jet(former navy) I am familiar with all types of aircraft,it swooped down without sound there was a kind of humming sound when it got closer I pointed at it and a lot of people seen it as well it came to rest in the 17 bypass median hovered a few seconds the grass under it was blowing ,I could see a person in the cockpit , it was clear ,then the cockpit turned black like limo tint,it then made some crazy moves and took off with extroidenary speed ,rejoining the other objects,then they flew away.The odd thing is that the others that seen the event just acted as if it never happened,even my wife.the craft was silver gray with some kind of green markings on it.I have been keeping this to myself for years.but it seems that reports are coming in more often and felt I should tell someone. Thanks
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in North Myrtle Beach
There were no other sightings in North Myrtle Beach on or around July 3rd 2005
